  • Uses of CodeTransform in jdk.internal.classfile.components

    Subinterfaces of CodeTransform in jdk.internal.classfile.components
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    CodeLocalsShifter
    CodeLocalsShifter is a CodeTransform shifting locals to newly allocated positions to avoid conflicts during code injection.
    interface 
    CodeRelabeler
    CodeRelabeler is a CodeTransform replacing all occurrences of Label in the transformed code with new instances.
    interface 
    CodeStackTracker
    CodeStackTracker is a CodeTransform tracking stack content and calculating max stack size.
